remarks: Combine ~ cmpcov with ~ ac6sfi to show the existence of a function that indexes the elements that are generating the open cover.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2014.)
statement:
iscmp.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
cmpcovf.2 $e |- ( z = ( f ` y ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cmpcovf $p |- ( ( J e. Comp /\ A. x e. X E. y e. J ( x e. y /\ E. z e. A ph ) ) -> E. s e. ( ~P J i^i Fin ) ( X = U. s /\ E. f ( f : s --> A /\ A. y e. s ps ) ) ) $.
$d A f s x y z $.
$d J s x y z $.
$d X s x $.
$d f ph s x $.
$d ps s z $.
